articles.title: Sofia Vergara Exits ‘America’s Got Talent’ Stage After Joke About Her Divorce: ‘That’s It’ - HuffPost
articles.description: It's the second time that the subject of Vergara's recent split from Joe Manganiello has come up on "AGT."
articles.content:
Sofia Vergara apparently isnt a fan of jokes about her newly single status.

articles.title: American bully XL owners speak of heartbreak at ban - BBC
articles.description: The dogs will be outlawed after a spate of attacks, but some say irresponsible owners, not animals, are to blame.
articles.content:
Owners of American bully XLs have spoken of their "heartbreak" at Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's decision to ban the breed.
